quotes: A man with outward courage dares to die: a man with inner courage dares to live.
Many a man has failed because he had his wishbone where his backbone should have been.
Debt is the slavery of the free.
People tend to complicate their own lives, as if living weren't already complicated enough.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
If you can't explain it simply, you don't understand it well enough.
Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
Surround yourself with only people who are going to lift you higher.
It's the unknown we fear when we look upon death and darkness, nothing more.
If ever you feel like an animal among men, be a lion.
Success is built sequentially. It's one thing at a time.
If you're not failing every now and again, it's a sign you're not doing anything very innovative.
Victorious warriors win first and then go to war, while defeated warriors go to war first and then seek to win.
We create the world and ourselves;
Consider the rights of others before your own feelings, and the feelings of others before your own rights.
It takes a minute to have a crush on someone, an hour to like someone, and a day to love someone... but it takes a lifetime to forget someone.
To lead the people, walk behind them.
Nothing is too high for a man to reach, but he must climb with care and confidence
Your heart is the size of an ocean. Go find yourself in its hidden depths.
If you focus on results and finding shortcuts, you'll get impatient. If you focus on the process and doing the right thing, you'll be unstoppable.
We turn not older with years but newer every day.
If you want to feel happy, do something for yourself. If you want to feel fulfilled, do something for someone else.
Life's too mysterious to take too serious.
Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
Success comes to those who become success conscious.
To share your weakness is to make yourself vulnerable; to make yourself vulnerable is to show your strength.
Every person, all the events of your life are there because you have drawn them there. What you choose to do with them is up to you.
The outer conditions of a person's life will always be found to reflect their inner beliefs.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
In youth we run into difficulties. In old age difficulties run into us.
We have to live life with a sense of urgency so not a minute is wasted.
Imagination is the true magic carpet.
Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
Creativity is intelligence having fun.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
One of the really tough things is figuring out what questions to ask. Once you figure out the question, then the answer is relatively easy.
Our stories may be singular, but our destination is shared.
One machine can do the work of fifty ordinary men. No machine can do the work of one extraordinary man.
Life is from the inside out. When you shift on the inside, life shifts on the outside.
The eyes of others our prisons; their thoughts our cages.
Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.
Intelligent men are cruel. Stupid men are monstrously cruel.
Words are the clothing of our thoughts.
Happiness is a choice, not a result. Nothing will make you happy until you choose to be happy.
Rest and be kind, you don't have to prove anything.
Change yourself and you have done your part in changing the world.
Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow know what you truly want to become.
New opinions are always suspected, and usually opposed, without any other reason but because they are not common.
The wise speak only of what they know.
